She isnt ntr'ed by gyaru, in the past when she first come to the city she need some money and got scouted by gyaru looking man to do some AV stuff likely, and she was saved by her husband and after her husband died she start fuck around to forget her husband. Btw Fmc is MC ( 家庭教師 ) it means tutor.

@zombieadd Where do you get she was his teacher or that he was thinking about meeting her again. It's more likely his brother was her deceased husband and there's no implication what so ever that he is thinking about meeting her again. He encounters her at the end, she says thank you, and he wonders if she's happy now...that's it. Also, note how much her current man looks like her deceased husband...

From what I understood using an MTL for the last few pages, ever since her husband died she started to fuck around with dudes because of sadness and despair trying to forget him and find a new love but all that only made her realize he is the only one she loves and is filled with guilt since she feels like a cheating wife. MC after hearing this askes her if he also is just another dude she used for her own pleasing and reasons, but even after learning this he still loves her. After that, he never saw her again and there's a time skip. After crossing paths with her she says to him "Thank you" and while he watches her go thinks "Are you happy now?". So yeah, the ending was a bit confusing but since I used MTL something probably got loss in translation.

WARNING - This is all based solely on my opinion from what I watched (no Jap experience), so read at your own discretion :D I mean, based on the pictures alone, it's like MC was a student and teacher seduced him. He fell in love with her but found out she had a dark past from that video of her being gangbanged by old men. So MC confronted her and she showed him her husband(?) died so she fell into depression and maybe got NTR'd(?) by some delinquent (gyaru-oh) guy. MC sympathized with her and cried after finding out the truth. 3 years later, he came back as his friend(or someone he knew) came to pick him up and stumbled upon his sensei again who seemed to had gotten another man but then (this part seemed a little confusing) MC started reminiscing and thought about meeting her again(?).
